spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. The U-shaped kitchen counter and laundry appliances are accurately positioned. Deductions for the door to Bedroom 2 being hinged on the wrong side compared to the plan, and the window in the laundry room being omitted/replaced by a wall.

structural_fidelity.notes: Perfect structural adherence. No text labels or UI measurements present. All rooms from the 2D plan are accounted for. Floating model on dark neutral background is correctly implemented.

furniture_mapping.notes: Block-style furniture mirrors the plan very closely, including the dining set, living room layout, and bathroom fixtures (corner tub). One desk/dresser in Bedroom 2 is slightly reinterpreted but maintains scale.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Mastery of the requested style. Low-poly, flat shading with simple colors. Accurate isometric orthographic projection with no photorealistic textures or dramatic lighting.

detected_errors.description: Bedroom 2 door swing direction is inverted compared to the original floor plan.
The small window in the laundry room (bottom left) is missing in the 3D model.
